    • put

      public boolean put​(Player player, Piece piece, Position position)
      从接口复制的说明: Game
      Choice 1 put one particular piece on the board the player should be gaming the piece should belong to the player and be out of the board the position should be free and legally in the board
      指定者:
      put 在接口中 Game
      参数:
      player - the operating player
      piece - the putting piece
      position - the position related to the action
      返回:
      true if the put is legal

      public Player isFree​(Player player, int x, int y)
      从接口复制的说明: Game
      Choice 4 ask a position whether it is free the position should be within the board
      指定者:
      isFree 在接口中 Game
      返回:
      player if the position is occupied, null if the position is free

    • sumPiece

      public java.util.Map<Player,​java.lang.Integer> sumPiece​(Player player)
      从接口复制的说明: Game
      Choice 5 ask the sum of the piece on the board
      指定者:
      sumPiece 在接口中 Game
      返回:
      a map whose keys are the players and values are the sum of the pieces of both players
